summary: Two strangers meet on the road and travel through Nevada on motorcycle to find an elusive spot where they can dump another man's ashes.
cast: John Doe|David Anthony Marshall|Judyth Thurman|Biff Yeager|Sonna Chavez|Adam Horovitz|Erica Rogers|JD Cullum|Ebbe Roe Smith|David Swinson|Aaron Lustig|Arlo Guthrie|Timothy Leary|Pam Lambert|Beth DePatie|Barton Heyman|Don Cheadle|Jeanne McCarthy|Viva Vinson|John Cusack|Lee Arenberg|Nancy Lenehan|Manny Chevrolet|Dick Rude|Tony Ruglio|Billy Ferrick|Flea|Peter Weiss|Jennifer Balgobin|Lena Madjerec|David Carradine|Stephen Tobolowsky|John Snyder|Bill Cobbs|Lin Shaye|Harry Caesar|Ed Pansullo|Onice Bodozian|Gregory Sporleder|Patti Tippo|Nic Ratner|Harty Grinner|Ellie Raab|Hector|Del Zamora
title: Profetas de la carretera
